name: Coal Powerhouse
title: Leading Coal-Based Electricity Production
description: In 2022, Botswana generated 96.19% of its electricity from coal sources, making it one of the highest coal-dependent countries in the world.

name: Debt-Free Zone
title: Minimal External Debt Burden
description: Botswana maintained a low external debt with private non-guaranteed debt at $4.35 million in 2022 and public and publicly guaranteed IDA debt at just $45,000 in 2023.
